name: RecorderRomanianNews
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to recorder.ro daily news in Romanian.
You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
